title: Teemoing Mini-Game Issue
body:
Hello, I have tried playing the little mini-game that unlocks a unique Icon for your account, only the game seems to not be working on my end?

I just sit there and mash the button like it says and nothing changes or happens, I have tried clearing my cache and re-logging my account on the website.

Is there something I am missing?

Thanks!

replies.body:
If you have a touch-screen the mouse won't work for you.  Only the touch-screen will.
Not sure if that's the prob on your end though.
That fixed the issue, not sure why that happens. Never thought to try that way, thanks!

Nothing changes as in minions don't hop into the cauldron? Can you try another browser in case you have a conflicting browser addon that's causing this? Get to 500 clicks and let me know if you still have issues.
The issue was related to mouse clicks not working when using a touchscreen, not sure if a bug or meant to be that way. Thanks!
